# receiveCompletion

**Instance Property**

The closure to execute on completion.

## Declaration

```swift
final var receiveCompletion: (Subscribers.Completion<Failure>) -> Void { get }
```

## Inspecting subscriber properties

- **receiveValue**: The closure to execute on receipt of a value.
